bibl.title: An Arsinoite Landowner and Clarissimus Magister of a Military Unit.
bibl.note: Top portion of a land lease (40 arouras situated around the hamlet Piamouei, in the Arsinoite nome), 2 December 510. The land belongs to a vir clarissimus who is styled magister of an uncertain military unit.
bibl.seg: Benaissa Amin, An Arsinoite Landowner and Clarissimus Magister of a Military Unit.

Top portion of a land lease (40 arouras situated around the hamlet Piamouei, in the Arsinoite nome), 2 December 510. The land belongs to a vir clarissimus who is styled magister of an uncertain military unit.
